fields.name: Alert_0_0
fields.fieldText: You must insert an email address before creating a Portal user!

fields.name: NotAbleToCreateCommunityUser
fields.fieldText: You are unable to create the user access to the onboarding portal as user {!Get_User_by_Email_and_another_ContactId.Name} already exists with same email as {!GetContact.Name}. Change email on contact {!GetContact.Name}.

screens.name: EmailExists_on_another_name_on_Community_User
screens.label: EmailExists on another name on Community User

fields.name: NotAbleToCreateCommunityUserAnotherName
fields.fieldText: You are unable to create the user access to the onboarding portal as user {!Get_User_by_Email_and_same_ContactId.Name} already exists with same email but another name as {!GetContact.Name}. Change email on contact {!GetContact.Name}.

fields.name: LicenseErrorText
fields.fieldText: All Experience Cloud user licenses are in use!

fields.name: NoGatherInformationCase
fields.fieldText: You are unable to invite the user to the onboarding portal as there is no case in gather information.

screens.name: Not_allowed_to_create_user_for_TPX_renewal
screens.label: Not allowed to create user for TPX renewal

fields.name: TPX_Renewal_Help_Text
fields.fieldText: You are not allowed to create an onboarding portal user if the quote contains TPX or Touchpoint products.

fields.name: Alert_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: Portal user was successfully created! The contact "{!GetContact.Name}" will receive a confirmation email on the email address "{!GetContact.Email}".

fields.name: Select_Yes_if_you_want_to_add_contact_as_Sales_Contact_to_the_opportunity
fields.fieldText: Select Yes if you want to add contact as Sales Contact to the opportunity

fields.name: Alert_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: Portal user was successfully updated! The contact "{!GetContact.Name}" will receive a confirmation email on the email address "{!GetContact.Email}".

fields.name: Select_Yes_if_you_want_to_add_contact_as_Sales_Contact_to_the_opportunity2
fields.fieldText: Select Yes if you want to add contact as Sales Contact to the opportunity
